snippet: Syria’s president has sought to project an air of normalcy on social media, though the terrain has been largely dominated by the rebel brigades and activist groups that oppose him.
abstract: Syria’s president has sought to project an air of normalcy on social media, though the terrain has been largely dominated by the rebel brigades and activist groups that oppose him.

headline.main: On Assad's Social Media Accounts, an Effort to Project Calm
